sn16.4:4.2: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, kathaṃrūpo bhikkhu arahati kulūpako hotuṃ, kathaṃrūpo bhikkhu na arahati kulūpako hotun”ti?
sn16.4:5.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃcitto kulāni upasaṅkamati:
sn16.4:5.7: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno evaṃcittassa kulāni upasaṅkamato na denti, tena bhikkhu sandīyati;
sn16.4:5.11: dandhaṃ denti, no sīghaṃ, tena bhikkhu sandīyati;
sn16.4:5.16: Evarūpo kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na arahati kulūpako hotuṃ.
sn16.4:6.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃcitto kulāni upasaṅkamati:
sn16.4:6.8: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno evaṃcittassa kulāni upasaṅkamato na denti;
sn16.4:6.10: so na tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayati.
sn16.4:6.13: so na tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayati.
sn16.4:6.16: so na tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayati.
sn16.4:6.19: so na tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayati.
sn16.4:6.22: so na tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayati.
sn16.4:6.23: Evarūpo kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahati kulūpako hotuṃ.
sn16.4:7.8: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, kassapassa evaṃcittassa kulāni upasaṅkamato na denti;
sn16.4:7.10: so na tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayati.
sn16.4:7.13: so na tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayati.

sn16.4:7.19: so na tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayati.
sn16.4:7.22: so na tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayati.
sn16.4:7.23: Kassapena vā hi vo, bhikkhave, ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso.
sn16.4:7.24: Ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabban”ti.
